mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT board_table.*, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${order}) as rn FROM board_table WHERE ${searchType} Like #{searchKeyword}) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
mapper.insert: insert into board_table(id, boardWriter, boardTitle, boardContents, category, isFile) values (seq_board.NEXTVAL, #{boardWriter}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents},#{category},#{isFile})
